Text:
This is the biggest torrent for me now.....so pls seed it with all u can...

i did MC3 because i have seen enough of gamelofts ignorance towards its blackberry users....releasing it almost a year after other platforms....is not good...

but i will not upload 9mm HD...its very cheap...go buy it....its not worth the effort....if u have some problem...tell me
seed plssssss...Thanks a lot Manav19..Waiting for the Apps Part 4.

I thought Falling Fred was in another torrent..?

Thank you though so much!
Thanks Manav! Falling Fred was in another torrent, but this is Running Fred :)

cant get to install the bard's tale... I did the new OS update today, I wonder if its because of that, I did the update before installing the game. It's the first game from Manav that I can't get to install, I get an error 500 or something I dont remember.
false alarm, it does work even with the new OS update, I hate to try a couple of times to load it, but now it works fine, thank you.

hello everyone....the bards tale is a huge game....so it takes a lot of time to transfer and then install it....its final size is near 4 gb...so pls be patient...u have to leave ur pb for about like an hr or so to let it finish...

anyways suggestions open for the next apps pack...

Thanks Manav19 for the great uploads :)
Would really love some medical apps..Need them for my college..nd also some pdf,pdb,chm file readers plss..
